quote_first: “All right, Matt, let’s assume that the point of maximum risk is the Capitol itself, at
quote_raw: “All right, Matt, let’s assume that the point of maximum risk is the Capitol itself, at 10:06, right on the steps—what then?”
title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: She gets out of her car at the east front of the Capitol at
quote_raw: She gets out of her car at the east front of the Capitol at six minutes past [ten].
title: Shall We Tell the President?
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: You have fifteen minutes, he said. Then the connection went dead. Wednesday,
quote_raw: You have fifteen minutes, he said. Then the connection went dead. Wednesday, 10:06 a.m.
title: Gone
author: Lisa Gardner
